channel.title: MoparCraft has updated! [1.3.2] + More
channel.description:
MoparCraft has updated to 1.3.2, simply update your clients and you'll be able to play. Please bear in mind as with all updates there may be the odd bug, while we have tested the server a lot we never know what can happen. If you find any bugs please feel free to PM an administrator :)
Have fun!
On a slightly unrelated note, beds now lock! This should stop all the complaining about your bed being stolen. We've also refixed the issue where chests would appear as stone (which somehow came to be once we updated to 1.3.2). If there are any other suggestions/issues, as stated above, PM an administrator.

item.title: MoparCraft has updated! [1.3.2] + More
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Just to add to this, when we updated TNT broke but it now works again. If you had TNT permission before you can now use TNT in the same fashion as before 1.3.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparCraft has updated! [1.3.2] + More
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Tom:

Okay, sorry for not replying for a short while, the developer of xAuth has acknowledged the issue and is going to update the plugin soon. Hopefully that should fix it. For now, I suggest those that this happens to be a little cautious when logging in/out (For example, put your items in a chest).

awesome, that didn’t take that much time at all, good job staff people.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Well on reproducing this issue, my bed was underground and directly above it was a cobblestone wall (this happened when I died and when i logged if i am underground at the time). Hope that helps and as far as the whole chunk loading issue, it happened for the first time(to me, can’t speak for others) after the server was updated and me suffocating in the wall happened right after Zuppers told us he was going to restart the server for “some strange reason” and it kept happening after that.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparCraft has updated! [1.3.2] + More
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Strange, the chunk loading seems very slow. After looking into it, it would appear the configuration of the anti-xray was reset with the update, the configuration has been reverted for the most part to how Moparisthebest had the old one setup. If this doesn’t fix the issue completely please post here again and I’ll look into it a lot more.

As always, the changes take effect after a server restart. Another possibility is that it is xAuth, but I’d rather know now if it was just orebfuscator before we go taking everything apart to fix the issue (I would be able to tell you if this fixed it, but I’m honestly unable to reproduce the issue by myself, but I could see some slow chunk loading when spawned in sometimes but Zuppers has confirmed he had the issue as well)

Read full topic
